reviewText: Hello - I would like to review the product - which arrived in good time etc. but unfortunately it was a DVD and not the Planetary Science  model making kit - it seems to have the same name exactly.  Would be good to know if the model kit is available.  Best wishes.  Twig Hall

great photos of the solar system. Gave it to my adult son as present and he ran it right away. We both were disappointed that it didn't cover the recent downgrading of Pluto and discussion of the other recently re named "minor" Planets.
